title: What got me interested in game glitches anyway???
content:
[url=http://kontek.net/davidwonn/]Dave Wonn's Unique Video Game Glitches[/url] is the site that got me interested in game glitches. Send me a beta at [url=mailto:HarveySmth3rdemail@hotmail.com] HarveySmth3rdemail@hotmail.com[/url]![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] -------------------
A proud member of the beta testing society
[url=http://www.garfield.com/comics/comics_todays.html]www.garfield.com/comics/comics_todays.html[/url]
Down with VGA! Up with EGA!
Email me a beta at [url=mailto:HarveySmiths3rdemail@hotmail.com] HarveySmiths3rdemail@hotmail.com[/url]! :-)

title: Re: What got me interested in game glitches anyway???
content:
What has any beta to do with this? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]

Anyways, nice site. I got interested in glitches when I just found some in some game. Didn't know the word what they were called, at that time.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oldy.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: What got me interested in game glitches anyway???
content:
Beta's have to do with it because he can find them easily.

I got interested in glitches from Super Mario 64 (heehee i can have mario fly around with no energy left!!!)[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: What got me interested in game glitches anyway???
content:
I like game glitches because no one writes them anymore! Modern games are almost glitchless! Oh acursed 3D modeling!A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: What got me interested in game glitches anyway???
content:
Yeah. I love glitches...

Like beating Super Mario 64 with 16 stars (it CAN be done!!)
minus world in super mario bros 1 (very wierd)
All those strange glitches in debug mode of sonic the hedgehog (including one where you become mega super sonic!!)
And of course theres commander keen!!
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: What got me interested in game glitches anyway???
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Modern games are almost glitchless![hr][/quote]
You've never played GTA or RollerCoaster Tycoon 3, then. Damn, those games have so many holes in you could use them as sponges.[url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url]
[img]http://www.toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: What got me interested in game glitches anyway???
content: Yeah, there are glitches in modern games as well. I haven't played them much, but for example in THPS series you can find cool places. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: What got me interested in game glitches anyway???
content:
By GTA, do you mean grand theft auto? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] HAHA time to rub it in thier dumb "rich" faces!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

314: Hey guys, your games are full of programming errors!!
Guys: No! PS2 is WAAYY better than stupid games like mario!!
314: *loads up GTA. character walks 5 feet and falls through the ground without warning*
Guys: Thats the levellord copy, stupid!
314: THAT explains all the holes in the ground!!

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img] [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: What got me interested in game glitches anyway???
content: There are some good glitches in GTA as well. I've gotten underwater couple of times. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: What got me interested in game glitches anyway???
content:
I like the glitch in Sonic Adventure that you can get Tails to go into Emerald Coast. But you die at the end of the level due to a bug. I think there is a method with Knuckles but I havnt tried it out yet. Check out my blog at [url=http://spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/]spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/[/url]
Check out my fanfics at [url=http://www.fanfiction.net/u/680124/]fanfiction.net[/url]
